Ok. And for the English version then how will it be?
Ok. А для Английской версии тогда как это будет?
Ранее для Итальянского сайта мы делали текст:
What text should the acceptance checkbox have when registering? In Italian and English?
Какой текст должен быть у checkbox принятия условий при регистрации? На Итальянском и Английском?

As for the buttons on the slides. For those cases when there are no additional slides (next or previous), they take a subtle form and turn off, making it clear that switching the slide further is not possible. If there is a slide, the arrow takes on a clearer look. Sample: https://www.fairhillauction.com/auction/100/lot-11/ Shall we change anything?

Что касается кнопок на слайдах. Для тех случаев когда дополнительных слайдов нет (следующих или предыдущих) они принимают малозаметный вид и отключаются, давая понять что переключение слайда дальше не возможно. В случае когда слайд есть, стрелочка принимает более отчётливый вид. Sample: https://www.fairhillauction.com/auction/100/lot-11/ Будем что либо менять?
Что касается Google Analitics, вы можете прислать код который надо интегрировать на сайт?
We will correct all the points that were described earlier.
Все моменты что описали ранее исправим.
now i will make all the edits that i described.
Now I will make all the edits that I described.
Сейчас внесу все правки что описали.
חודש
If 0 in user - use settings, if not use user value
If 0 - do not check

Регистрацию проверял сегодня утром.

At the expense of the problem with an error in auction 10. The problem is solely in the user's cache. Measures were taken so that the user's browser would receive an updated version of the files from the server. With regards to onerous registration, could you please describe the problem in more detail? Since the entire registration process takes place without refreshing the page and confirmation emails from Bidspirit come without delay. What may be the problem is not entirely clear. Checked this morning.

Hello! At the expense of the problem with an error in auction 10. The problem is solely in the user's cache. Measures were taken so that the user's browser would receive an updated version of the files from the server. With regards to onerous registration, could you please describe the problem in more detail? Since the entire registration process takes place without refreshing the page and confirmation emails from Bidspirit come without delay. Checked this morning.

На счёт проблемы с ошибкой в 10 аукционе. Проблема исключительно в кеше пользователя. Приняли меры что бы браузер пользователя получил обновлённую версию файлов с сервера. Что касается обременительной регистрации, не могли бы вы подробнее описать проблему? Так как весь процесс регистрации проходит без обновления страницы и письма от Bidspirit для подтверждения приходят без задержки. В чём может быть проблема не совсем ясно. Проверил сегодня утром.

Hello! На счёт проблемы с ошибкой в 10 аукционе. Проблема исключительно в кеше пользователя. Приняли меры что бы браузер пользователя получил обновлённую версию файлов с сервера. Что касается обременительной регистрации, не могли бы вы подробнее описать проблему? Так как весь процесс регистрации проходит без обновления страницы и письма от Bidspirit для подтверждения приходят без задержки. Проверил сегодня утром.
Get invoices by user

Will create a billing_history record with charge_date = biling_next_payment_date and charge_status will be ToPay Will try to do charge and create invoice On success or failure will send an “Admin - charge done” message. On success only will send “Member - charge done” message On failure - will delete

Clients will get the offer by push notification, sms or email and will be able to mark the offer as not relevant to call the Member. https://app.moqups.com/f713U3G7ar/view/page/a73e717f4 All calls will be recorded using call redirect service.

Clients will fill up the form with price, weekdays, area and type of rooms and will get an explanation about the future process screen. https://app.moqups.com/f713U3G7ar/view/page/ad64222d5 Stage 2 After each offer is published by a Member, if this offer mutch the form Client fills up - system will try to send push notification to Client. If the system will not be able to do it - it will try to send sms. If we don’t have a mobile number or sms will not be sent - will send an email.
After patent and invoice will create row in billing_history
After payment user will see thanks page in payment iframe and will be updated and biling_next_payment_date will be changed according to biling_type.

Member will see payment screen Members will change billing cycles - users.biling_type will be updated immediately and users will see different prices. Iframe will display credit card info will be displayed.
After the end of call with Client, Members will receive a sms with a link to the offer edit and will be able to close the offer so the system will not send the offer to additional clients.

Approved member will be able to publish the offer based on max number of offers he can publish setted by Admin https://app.moqups.com/y56VfcXulX/view/page/acb3c9d4e On offer publish screen Member will be able to click on statistics and see requests statistics graph for selected area based on room he selected https://app.moqups.com/y56VfcXulX/view/page/af2c64888

After the Member finishes adding the rooms he will see a page explaining to him what his profile is waiting for approval by Admin. After Admin will approve the Member - Member will get email with note what he can continue and publish the offers.
And will be able to continue and create room/s.
After registration, Members will see a page with an explanation of the process.
A notification about the registration of a new Member will be sent to Admin and Admin will be able to set the Member as active.

Indicates what transaction will be performed by the MPI and setup the hosted page transaction accordingly.A regular sale is AutoCommFor tokenization only use 'Token'.For authorization only on a two phase sale use ‘Verify’for reverse tokenization (when enabled) use 'CardNo', for other transaction type refer to "validation" tag XML API documentation
Success transaction
Cancel of transaction
